projects.name: Cryptopot
projects.description: A fully-functional honeypot for an in-house cryptocurreny exchange platform. The idea of this project was to make something that was both challenging as well as something that could be used for educational purposes later on. The honeypot consists of three security levels (least to most secure) and supports a variety of attacks including but not limited to SQL Injections, XSS, IDORs, PrivEsc, and more.
projects.technologies: PHP, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, MySQL

projects.name: CHIP-8 Emulator
projects.description: A small emulator for the CHIP-8 interpreter language. This implementation uses C++ for the core functionality and a SDL2 backend completes the emulator with sound, keyboard input and GL display.

projects.name: File Cabinet
projects.description: A multi-user web application to store text documents made using Ruby on Rails, Haml, and SCSS. It allows users to store and edit text files with the ability to add, edit and delete documents on the server. Implemented using MVC architecture with support for user authentication.

projects.name: C++ Keylogger
projects.description: A simple keylogger for windows created in C++

projects.name: Image Color Extractor
projects.description: Identify most used colours in a image using python, flask, scikit and opencv

projects.name: Rubber Ducky
projects.description: A raspberry pi pico rubber ducky device that can be used to play pranks or be used as a hacking tool.
projects.technologies: python, circuitpython, adafruit_usb_hid, Raspberry Pi Pico,

projects_2.name: DogsVsCats-Classification-convolutional_neural_network
projects_2.description: A convolutional neural network for classification of the Dogs and Cats dataset provided by microsoft

projects_2.description: A quiz bot for discord with a twist

projects_2.name: Tidy API
projects_2.description: A rest api that returns information about how to recycle things
projects_2.technologies: javascript, node.js, express.js, datastax astra, cql

projects_2.name: Smart Interface for specially abled
projects_2.description: An arduino based way for the differently abled to interact with some appliances and electronics in their home.
projects_2.technologies: c++, tinkercad, arduino-uno, bluetooth hc-05 module

projects_2.name: TrachH20
projects_2.description: An arduino based device to help you stay hydrated
projects_2.technologies: c++, tinkercad, arduino-uno, pir motion sensor
